name: Cream Cheese Pie Crust
description: Make the simplest cream cheese pie crust! This easy recipe requires just 3 ingredients for a crust you can fill with a variety of fillings.
instructions: In a food processor, medium mixing bowl or stand mixer, combine butter and cream cheese. Gradually add flour and pulse or mix until well combined. Form ball and press into a disc. Cover in plastic wrap dusted with flour and refrigerate 30 minutes. Roll out on a floured surface and place in a greased pie dish or divide into tins for individual pies.
